settings.heading: Shipping
settings.row_content: We are pleased to offer free ground shipping on U.S. orders over $75. U.S. orders under $75 incur a flat-rate shipping fee of $6. For expedited shipping, please email hello@epilogicskincare.com. To note: International orders may be subject to import taxes, customs duties and fees levied by the destination country. These fees are the responsibility of the purchaser and are not included in our international shipping fee.

settings.heading: Returns
settings.row_content: Unopened epi.logic products may be returned for a full item refund (less shipping) to your original form of payment within 30 days of receipt. Opened products or those received over 30 days prior are not eligible for return. To process a return, please emailhello@epilogicskincare.com. Please note that we are unable to accept returns for shipments to Canada, Europe or other international destinations.

settings.heading: Payment
settings.row_content: We are pleased to accept all major credit cards and debit cards. Unfortunately we are unable to accept prepaid gift cards, checks or money orders.

settings.heading: Cancellations
settings.row_content: We cannot guarantee any cancellations or changes once your order is complete, but we are sometimes able to make changes to orders that have not yet shipped. Orders that have already shipped cannot be changed or canceled. If your order has already been dispatched, we will be happy to set up a return for unopened products, within 15 days of receipt. Please emailhello@epilogicskincare.comfor more information.

settings.heading: Can I use epi.logic products while pregnant or nursing?
settings.row_content: While retinol (present in Double Feature and Eye Contact) is not recommended for pregnant or nursing women, the majority of epi.logic products are safe. If you have any questions or concerns, we recommend speaking to your physician prior to use.

settings.heading: What should I do if I experience irritation after using epi.logic products?
settings.row_content: Immediately stop using a product if irritation occurs. Please also note product directions on the package. Specifically, you should limit initial use of Double Feature to once or twice a week, gradually increasing frequency to every other night as retinol can lead to dryness. Additionally, retinol and AHA (both present in Double Feature) may increase sensitivity to sunburn, therefore a broad-spectrum sunscreen should always be worn when using the product. Actually, as Dr. Jeanniton would say: A broad-spectrum sunscreen should be worn every day, regardless of your epi.logic routine!

settings.heading: Are epi.logic products ever tested on animals?
settings.row_content: epi.logic products are never tested on animals.

settings.heading: Are epi.logic products vegan?
settings.row_content: The growth factors in Master Plan are derived from human adipose (fat), but there is no cellular matter in the product. All other epi.logic products are vegan.
